description.zh: 字彙, 文法, 閱讀, 解讀。
本課程使學生具有進階日語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to enhance their Japanese abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the Japanese language.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎日語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。學習內容如下：量詞、形容詞、比較表達、動詞masu形之句型（希望和目的）、動詞te形之句型（請求、進行中動作、許可、禁止、持續狀態、連續動作）以及主題句型。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic Japanese abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the Japanese language. The contents of the learning are as follows: quantifiers, adjectives, comparative expressions, the masu form of verbs (hope and purpose), the te form of verbs (request, ongoing action, permission, prohibition, continuous state, continuous action) and topic sentence patterns.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎日語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic Japanese abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the Japanese language.

description.zh: 中文概述	在接洽商務時能以最基本的日文能力應用在名片交換、自我介紹或洽商時基本會話、禮儀及習俗等之應對。第一篇：商務必備 第一章：交換名片與自我介紹 第二章：電話應對實務 第三章：商務會話實務第二篇：模擬洽商 第一章：到日本訪問時的商務會話實務 第二章：在台與日商買主交涉商業實務第三篇：日本文化有趣篇
description.en: This course introduces the fundamental conversation, courtesies and customs by using the Japanese. In addition to understand the origins and significance of these business behaviors, the students will be requested to conduct a simulated practice, such as changing the business card and self-introduction, in the class to have a better realization.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎日語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic Japanese abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the Japanese language.

description.zh: 國內半導體資訊、自動化、化學、精密工業等與日本關係非常密切。日本為世界第二大經濟大國，日文方面科技資料甚多，如能培養學生閱讀科技日文資料，對國內未來科技與工業之發展有莫大助益。本課程內容在於如何收集與閱讀日文方面科技資料，學習時分兩段，基礎篇與應用篇。
description.en: This course has been designed to provide students essential Japanese language ability for reading technical information. The course covers: (1)Basic Japanese grammar (2)Japanese technical phrase(3)Technical terminology: semiconductor, information technology, automation, biotechnolpgy, and polymer chemistry.

description.zh: 以日本歷史為主軸，專題探討日本文化與社會之特質。一. 美學意識二. 生死觀三. 武士道四. 傳統文化：藝術(花道、茶道)              藝能(歌舞伎、能與狂語)              運動(相撲、柔道、空手道)五. 生活習慣與行動樣式：集團歸屬志向                        序列社會                        宗教六. 飲食生活七. 動漫產業
description.en: The main topic of this course is Japanese history, and to explore the characteristics of the Japanese culture and society.

description.zh: 建立設計專業用日文基礎；日文發音、拼音、基本句型、詞類文法及設計專業日文導讀，用以唸讀及理解設計專業相關日文。
description.en: Introducing the alphabet pronunciation, phonation, sentence structures and the ten parts speech grammar of Japanese to building the capability of reading and understanding the design based Japanese.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:日語與文化(一)

description.zh: 本課程提供學生養成基本日語聽說讀寫技能，並能夠面對在各種情境下，表達出適當的日語，足以應付日常生活簡單狀況。此外，並運用多媒體等工具，介紹日本文化，歷史，人文等多種面向，讓學生能更多元地了解日本，有效提升學習興趣及效率。
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive approach to developing the four basic language skills (listening, speaking, reading, and writing) in order to cultivate your overall Japanese language ability to a level sufficient for various occasions and everyday life.In addition , using multimedia to introduce a variety of Japanese culture, history , and humanities. The students can learn more about Japan in many different perspectives, and effectively enhance interest in the learning process.
